options.name: Needle Spray (ST4-15)
options.faq: NOTE: Server Proxy

options.name: Electro Shocker (ST4-16)
options.faq: NOTE: Server Proxy

options.name: Laser Eye (ST5-15)
options.faq:
[Main] Trigger <De-Digivolve 1> on up to 2 of your opponent's Digimon.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Dark Side Attack (ST5-16)
options.faq:
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 7 or less.
[SEC] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: The Touch of Evil (ST6-15)
options.faq:
[Main] You may delete 1 of your Digimon to delete up to 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.
[Security] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon.

options.name: Nail Bone (ST6-16)
options.faq:
[Main] Play 1 purple level 3 and 1 purple level 4 Digimon from your trash without paying their memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on the Digimon played with this effect do not activate.
[SEC] Play 1 purple level 4 or lower Digimon from your trash without paying it's memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on the Digimon played with this effect do not activate.

options.name: Grace Cross Freezer (BT1-100)
options.faq: FAQ: If a Digimon digivolves after having this effect applied, it CAN attack!

options.name: A Delicate Plan (BT3-097)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "Elaborate Tactics! (Sp-3)"

options.name: We Have to Stop Fighting! (BT3-099)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "Let's Stop Fighting (Bo-51)"

options.name: Code Cracking (BT3-102)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "Cracker!! (Bo-1214)"

options.name: Hidden Potential Discovered!! (BT3-103)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum cards of the same name!

options.name: Looking Back on the Good Times (BT3-107)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "That Was a Good Time (St-57)"

options.name: Back for Revenge! (BT3-109)
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "Return Match! (St-104)"

options.name: Atomic Inferno (BT4-098)
options.faq:
[Main] 1 of your [Hybrid] form Digimon gets +3000 DP, gains <Security Attack +1>, and gains "[Your Turn] When this Digimon is blocked, gain 3 Memory." for the turn.
[Security] All of your Digimon get <Security Attack +1> until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Heir of Dragons (BT4-099)
options.faq: NOTE: Server Proxy
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "The One Who Inherits the Power of the Dragons (Vj-4)"

options.name: Trident Revolver (BT4-100)
options.faq:
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less. Then you may Play 1 Cost 4 or lower Tamer Card from your hand without paying its memory cost.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: I'll Drag You Into the Depths! (BT4-101)
options.faq:
[Main] All of your Digimon gain "[Your Turn] When this Digimon attacks a Digimon with no digivolution cards, delete that Digimon" for the turn.
[Security] Add this card to your hand.
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "I'll Pull You Down to the Bottom of the Ocean!! (St-110)"

options.name: Aqua Viper (BT4-102)
options.faq:
[Main] Return 1 of your Digimon to its owner's hand to return up to 2 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon to their owners' hands. Trash all of the digivolution cards of those Digimon.
[Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

options.name: Full Moon Blaster (BT4-103)
options.faq:
[Main] Return 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon to its owner's hand. If your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand, return 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon to the bottom of its owner's deck instead. (Trash all the digivolution cards of that Digimon.)
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Blinding Ray (BT4-104)
options.faq: [Main] Trash your top security card. Then gain 2 memory.

options.name: Tactical Retreat! (BT4-105)
options.faq:
[Main] Place 1 of your Digimon face-down on top of your security stack. (Trash all of the digivolution cards of that Digimon.)
[Security] <Recovery +1<Deck>>
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "A Tactical Retreat!! (St-607)"

options.name: Purge Shine (BT4-106)
options.faq:
[Main] All of your opponent's Digimon get -3000 DP for the turn.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Pollen Spray (BT4-107)
options.faq:
[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add all Digimon cards with <Digiburst> among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon for each card added to your hand by this effect.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Cyclonic Kick (BT4-108)
options.faq:
[Main] Unsuspend 1 of your Digimon and suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Final Zubagon Punch (BT4-109)
options.faq:
[Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +3000DP until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then when that Digimon has 16000DP or more, that Digimon gets <Blocker>, <Reboot>, and <Security Attack +1> until the end of your opponent's next turn
[Sec] Add this card to your hand

options.name: Dark Roar (BT4-110)
options.faq:
[Main] Destroy 1 of your opponent's Digimon with Play Cost of 3 or less. For every [D-Brigade] Digimon you have, increase the targetable Play Cost of this effect by 1
[Sec] Activate this card's [Main] effect

options.name: Jack Raid (BT4-111)
options.faq:
[Main] Gain 1 memory for every 10 cards in your trash.
[Sec] Gain 2 memory.

options.name: Hell's Gate (BT4-112)
options.faq:
[Main] Destroy 1 of your opponent's LV6 or above Digimon
[Sec] Add this card to your hand

options.name: Absolute Blast (BT5-097)
options.faq:
[Main] Trash the Digivolution card at the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then return 1 of your opponent's Digimon without Digivolution cards to the bottom of its owner's deck.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Wisselen (BT5-102)
options.faq:
[Main] Up to 2 of your opponent's Digimon cannot attack or block until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if you have a Digimon with <DigiBurst>, gain 2 memory.
[Security] Up to 2 of your opponent's Digimon cannot attack for the turn. Then, if you have a Digimon with <DigiBurst>, gain 2 memory.

options.name: The Hot, Furious Metal Storm!! (BT5-103)
options.faq:
[Main] Your Digimon with <Reboot> get +1000 DP and gain <Blocker> until the end of your opponent's next turn.
[Security] Your opponent's Digimon can't attack players for the turn. Then, add this card to your hand.
options.bonus: This card is based on the Hyper Colosseum card "The Hot, Furious Metal Storm!! (Sp-2 & Bo-602)"

options.name: Web Wrecker (BT5-104)
options.faq:
[Main] Trigger <De-Digivolve 2> on 1 of your opponents Digimon. Then, if you have a Diaboromon in play, you may play 1 [Diaboromon] token without paying its memory cost.
[Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

options.name: Earth Shaker (BT5-108)
options.faq:
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponents unsuspended level 4 Digimon and 1 of your opponents unsuspended level 5 Digimon.
[Security] Activate this cards main effect.

options.name: Patamon's Confession (P-023)
options.faq:
[Main] When you have a [Takaishi Takeru], put 1 of your [Patamon] to the bottom of your Security face down. Discard that Digimon's Evo sources
[SEC] Add this card to your hand

options.name: Tai's Growing Up! (P-024)
options.faq: [Main] If you have [Tai Kamiya], you can return 1 of your [Agumon] to the bottom of its owner's Deck, to trigger <Draw 3>. (Draw 3 cards from your deck.) (Trash all of the digivolution cards of that Digimon.)
